SCTX - Script Source:
ScriptName fbmwHTStrongholdQuestScript

SHORT BuildProgress
SHORT BuildTime


BEGIN GameMode
	IF GetStage fbmwHTStronghold == 50
		IF BuildProgress == 0
			SET BuildTime TO GameDaysPassed

			fbmwHTStrongholdConstruction1.Enable	;player stronghold

			fbmwHHStrongholdConstruction1.Enable	;non-player stronghold
			fbmwHRStrongholdConstruction1.Enable	;

			SET BuildProgress TO 1
		ENDIF

		IF GameDaysPassed - BuildTime > 5
			SetStage fbmwHTStronghold 55
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHTStronghold == 90
		IF BuildProgress == 1
			SET BuildTime TO GameDaysPassed
			SET BuildProgress TO 2
		ENDIF

		IF GameDaysPassed - BuildTime > 5
			fbmwHTStrongholdConstruction1.Disable

			fbmwHHStrongholdConstruction1.Disable
			fbmwHRStrongholdConstruction1.Disable

			fbmwHTStrongholdStage1.Enable

			fbmwHHStrongholdStage1.Enable
			fbmwHRStrongholdStage1.Enable

			SetStage fbmwHTStronghold 100
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHTStronghold == 170
		IF BuildProgress == 2
			SET BuildTime TO GameDaysPassed

			fbmwHTStrongholdConstruction2.Enable

			fbmwHHStrongholdConstruction2.Enable
			fbmwHRStrongholdConstruction2.Enable

			SET BuildProgress TO 3
		ENDIF

		IF GameDaysPassed - BuildTime > 5
			fbmwHTStrongholdConstruction2.Disable

			fbmwHHStrongholdConstruction2.Disable
			fbmwHRStrongholdConstruction2.Disable

			fbmwHTStrongholdStage1.Disable
			fbmwHTStrongholdStage2.Enable
			fbmwHTStrongholdStage2Only.Enable

			fbmwHHStrongholdStage2.Enable
			fbmwHRStrongholdStage2.Enable

			SetStage fbmwHTStronghold 200
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHTStronghold == 250
		IF BuildProgress == 3
			SET BuildTime TO GameDaysPassed
			fbmwHTStrongholdConstruction3.Enable
			SET BuildProgress TO 4
		ENDIF

		IF GameDaysPassed - BuildTime > 5
			fbmwHTStrongholdConstruction3.Disable
			fbmwHTStrongholdStage2Only.Disable
			fbmwHTStrongholdStage3.Enable

			SetStage fbmwHTStronghold 255
		ENDIF

	ENDIF ; GetStage fbmwHTStronghold

END ; GameMode
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 1827 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
